title: Daily Mail Online
description:
One of Google's "Best Apps of 2014 & 2015" with over 2 million downloads, the MailOnline (Daily Mail) app gives you everything you've come to expect and love from the world's largest English-language newspaper website, but with quick, easy and free access on your phone -- accessible even when you're offline.

Feed your daily addiction with stories & photos from all our top channels: US & World News, Celebrity & Showbiz, Sports, Femail, Science & Tech, Health, Money, Travel, and many more! 

See what everyone's talking about and download our app today.

FEATURES:
• Over 15 Channels of must-read articles and photos - that's over 800+ original stories every day!
• Offline Mode: Pre-load stories & galleries to access when you're offline or without reception - great for commutes!
• Select a Location: Choose from US, UK or Rest of World to ensure you get the news most relevant to you.
• Express Yourself: Post your Comments on articles or Rate other user's comments that you like or dislike.
• Custom Settings: Select when data and images sync based on your preferred connection (Wi-Fi or 3G).
• Choose which Channels you want to sync and when.

If you have any trouble with the app or want to suggest new features and feedback, please email us at androidapp@mailonline.co.uk so we can help.

recentChanges:
All the great stuff from before plus ➡️
Stability improvements, minor fixes & optimizations
comments: I love the variety of stories, but DM has ruined their site with too many pop-up ads. *Edit* February 2020 if I could give zero stars, I would. Their ads have gotten worse, if that's possible. Trying to view pictures that come with the articles is impossible. I didn't mind too much when I could exit them immediately, but now it won't let you back out of ads. I'm deleting this app.

This app was probably one of the best newspaper on line. It has now got to be the worst. Persistently crashing. DM appear to not want the user to read it's stories with the the addition of a NEWZIT ad to take you to your browser for 'live' stories, which take forever to download. Why does it have to appear on every story?. It is akin to a zit on your face, unwelcome!

Used to love this app, but everytime I swipe past a picture an ad pops up and you can't even close them right away. I think in gonna remove it from my phone soon. Can you imagine reading a book and everytime you turn the page an ad pops up. This app is like that but worse. I gave it two stars because I still like the content so much so that I was willing to pay for an ad free version but that's not even an option.

Gives additional news that I don't see from others, for which I give five stars. One recent change to the Android Daily Mail app seems to be using more battery(take 2 stars away for that). Another recent change is showing links to other stories in the middle of articles, which you have to scroll past, to read entire article, I do not like this change.

It used to be passable as a news app, despite the typos and grammatical mistakes from their so-called journalists, but now it's been ruined by intrusive pop-up ads, and a massive panel in the middle of every article advertising a service called "OldPustule" or something.

title: Daily Horoscope
description:
Horoscope - get yours from the best horoscope app on Google Play - the Daily Horoscope app. The top rated horoscope app! With over 10 million users!


Features:
• Daily horoscope (including tomorrow's horoscope)
• Weekly horoscope
• Monthly horoscope
• Easy launch horoscope widget
• Zodiac sign compatibility horoscope: 
• Chinese yearly horoscope for 2020, 2019 and 2018
• Zodiac yearly horoscope for 2020, 2019 and 2018
• Druid horoscope
• Ability to scroll back up to a week (or more with a subscription)
• Daily reminders for daily horoscope that you can setup in app's settings
• Custom colors and font size (adjust in "Settings")

Zodiac Horoscope
We cover all the zodiac sun sign horoscope:  Aries, Taurus,  Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius and Pisces. 

Chinese Horoscope
We cover all the Chinese horoscope signs:  Rat, Ox,  Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake, Horse, Ram, Monkey, Rooster, Dog and Pig. Please note that the Chinese horoscope follows Chinese calendar.

We offer extensive compatibility readings for each two zodiac signs. Compatibility section covers love, friendship, business and family aspects of every combination of two zodiac signs. Zodiac yearly section covers the yearly horoscope for signs.



§ Privacy:
We respect your privacy!
Unlike many other horoscope apps we DO NOT require ridiculous permissions like location, phone state, address book etc... We recommend avoiding apps that require these without proper justification. There are horoscope apps claiming they need your location to deliver you the horoscope. Just check from any other location (ask a friend in another country/state/city) - it will not make the slightest difference and then ask yourself if they lie about that, can you trust anything else they say? We urge you to review permissions carefully and uninstall apps that violate your privacy right away.


§ Permissions Explanation:
• INTERNET - required to download the horoscope
• BOOT - required to be able to re-schedule reminders (if any were set) after phone restart
***Note - this does not have any impact on the battery since the app does not run in the background



TOS/EULA disclaimer:
By downloading, installing and using the Daily Horoscope application, you agree to our end user license agreement:
http://www.comitic.com/eula

and our privacy policy:
http://www.comitic.com/privacy

comments: Its kind of scary how this applications predictions seem to be very relevant to whatever is going on in my life. I try to read this apps horoscope every day and read it over and throughout the day several times to implement the advice given most of the time because even if its not spot on they do always have positive advice and i like the way they word things. .::Geminiii::.***

Great horoscope app! I have had this app for years and it does not disappoint. I find it to be really accurate with my daily horoscopes. I like that you can customize the theme to how you like. I have tried other apps but this is the one.
Fun app. Often pretty accurate but not always. Definitely does what it should plus you get your weekly, monthly, yearly, Chinese and druid horoscopes as well.
It's pretty right on, no trouble or frustration with ads, doesn't change your entire phone layout like some do.
I love this app. It's pretty accurate, most days on point. Definitely recommend it...thanks.

title: Motivation - Daily quotes
description:
Whether you're dealing with depression, need an extra push to go to the gym, or simply like to share quotes in social media, Motivation has you covered.


Motivation contains a set of inspirational thoughts and sayings that will urge you to take daily action or if you just need a little dose of “pick me ups" throughout the day.


These quotes will guide and inspire you for any occasion! Set many daily reminders for yourself and share the uplifting quote of the day with your friends and family, or use the image for Instagram or as a wallpaper.


Motivation contains hundreds of quotes with deep and rich meanings, with a continuous stream of new ones added daily!

+ Read through Hundreds of Quotes
+ Save or Share
+ Set Motivational Reminders throughout the Day
+ Change Font and Colors
+ Filter by Category

From quotes about working out to love and family, Motivation has them all! Browse our thousands of quotes organized by category:
- Motivation to work harder
- Love
- Motivation to train and work out
- Help for depression
- Boost your self-esteem and self-confidence
- Get over a break up
- Life lessons and sayings
- Sport
- Business, money, success and career
- Being present and mindful
- Philosophy from the best minds
- And many more!

comments: The quotes are good. I just hate how you have to buy EVERYTHING!! There are people who actually NEED these quotes and NEED help but you're making them buy premium??!! You can only access 2 categories: Favorites and General... It's stupid. You have to watch ads to unlock themes... 🙄🙄

The app I personally have come to love. Positive little affirmations & mantras are a keystone for myself personally in life. The reminders can be set multiple times throughout the day with various categories. It's the excellent support one may need on a daily basis. I highly recommend it & going premium is not financially taxing.

It's a really awesome app I'm using the free version many amazing quotes the only thing preventing me from rating 5 stars and buying the full version is I like to use the widget and the widget goes blank like a few times a day and I have to open the app and it comes that if you would fix that it would be perfect
I love this app. It helps me relieve stress and smile and the good things in life. I love the quotes that are on there. Eventhough im not on premium the are fantastic quotes still on there.

I feel like this app locks (until paid for) the most important topics that quotes would help with. To even chose a topic of quotes you have to watch an add or pay. I think it does give good quotes for free but I wouldn't ask for money for sharing feelings through quotes

title: Our Daily Bread
description:
The Our Daily Bread devotional is read by millions of people around the world and encourages people to spend time with God every day. Join the Our Daily Bread community in growing closer to Christ. Daily readings are available in many languages, including English, Afrikaans, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Khmer, Malay, Myanmar, Polish, Russian, Spanish, Sinhala, Tamil, Thai, Ukrainian and Vietnamese.

With the Our Daily Bread app, it’s easy to:
* Download a month of daily readings at a time for offline access.
* Listen as you read with the built-in audio player.
* Set a daily reminder to help you stay in God’s Word.
* Share daily readings with your friends by email and social media.
* Bookmark your favorite daily readings and capture your thoughts in your private journal.
* Discuss daily readings with other Our Daily Bread readers in the public comments.

recentChanges: Our team is always working to improve the app experience for Our Daily Bread users. This release includes performance improvements & bug fixes.
comments: I've been a long time subscriber of the devotional booklets, and just recently download the app. I've also then donated to this app, and since then i havent been able to download the images attached to the daily devotion (enabled the download photos option). Whenever i click on the 'tap to share' option at the bottom of the devotional, the app crashes. I have uninstalled and installed multiple times in an attempt to 'reboot' the app but am still facing this problem. Help please.

Lately, over the past week, the app has not been working properly. It no longer shows the quote at the end of the devotional reading. Please fix this problem, I love reading Our Daily Bread. It is an excellent and necessary source for my own personal Bible study.

I believe this is the best daily devotional ever. And this is what I use for my personal Bible study. The only hitch is that sometimes it stops working and I have to uninstall/install. And of late it's not downloading the sharable image. A bit frustrating.

What is going on...??? I've been reading the ODB for over 15yrs, initially receiving via mail and/ or at church. But in the past 3 or 4yrs on my cell. The app has been locking up, stalling to the extent I cant read and GOD forbid cant even listen to it!!! Now I cant send my grand children the pic with the bible verse on it, which they looked forward to every morning...it was my way of having them read the WORD and get there young attention with the added pictures.Recently it hasnt been available

I love the app. It is app that can help you to devote your time with God. However I have problem: I would like to share devotional images with others, but it keeps disappearing. Yah. That's all. God bless.

title: Daily Motivational Quotes App
description:
ENLIVEN Daily Motivational Quotes App is a FREE inspiring App that shows you a new Motivational Quote on a daily basis, at a time of your choosing. You can Favorite, Share and Comment any of the thousands of inspirational Quotes available. Plus, you can use our unique Meditation technique at any time of the day to help you achieve Mindfulness. And all this is FREE!

Why you should install the ENLIVEN Daily Motivational Quotes App today:

✔ Get 365 DAILY Motivational Quotes in our FREE “BE AMAZING” Edition
✔ Access our Top 1,000 INSTANT Inspirational Quotes for immediate motivation
✔ Use our simple Meditation process every day to achieve Mindfulness
✔ Change the Daily Notifications time so you get them when you need them
✔ Share Quotes & Images on Facebook, Twitter & Instagram 
✔ Comment on Quotes to inspire others with your thoughts
✔ Favorite Quotes so you can find them easily
✔ Read our extensive Help section to make the most out of ENLIVEN
✔ Get additional Editions such as GO GET SUCCESS, THE SUN WILL RISE & LIVE LIFE NOW!

This beautiful App contains thousands of hand-selected Motivational Quotes from famous, and not so famous, people from all walks of life, no matter what their nationality or religion.

Download ENLIVEN Daily Motivational Quotes App for free today!

:: ACHIEVE MINDFULNESS via the Enliven Technique ::

Reading your Daily Motivational Quote, or getting a quick fix through the Instant feature, will certainly motivate you. However, the ENLIVEN App also promotes Mindfulness - a simple meditation process to help bring focus - which is available through the Enliven Technique, accessed on every Quote screen. The Enliven Technique is based upon the ancient practice of Trataka Candle Gazing. Use this to really center your thoughts and let these positive affirmations lift you up towards your life's desires. To enter the Enliven Technique, simply press the animation on the Quote screen for one second.

Try the Enliven Technique for quick and easy mindfulness and meditation today!

:: ABOUT US ::

Our purpose is to motivate and inspire you to be the very best you can be - to be a better you. Through the ENLIVEN Daily Motivational Quotes App, we are able to share some of the world's best motivational quotes, hand selected and grouped together in Editions based around your needs.

We would love to improve the App with quotes from different countries and cultures. The only rule is that the words should motivate and inspire. Please contact us with any inspirational quotes you think we should add to ENLIVEN, and the Edition you think they are most suited to.

If you have any suggestions as to how we can improve the App, we’d love to hear from you. Get in touch with us at contact@enliventhemind.com 

Thank you for supporting us! Share the motivational quotes you love with your friends and family … let’s make the world a better place together. Download ENLIVEN now!

comments: Works great and reliable! I need the quotes so I slow down and take a moment. Definitely works great for that.. Some quotes are a little funny in a random sort of way, but then I just get a funny start to the day!

Love the quotes! I use this app as a way to give myself a dedicated moment to myself. To check in and calm down, slow down and just breathe. I used to think it was impossible to see the after images while doing this. Now I know you can see it! Takes time and practice not to distract yourself. Love it!

This app is wonderful but could use updated quotes in instant area as well as daily ones in free edirion...having read and seen most at some point! Infact all need updated on a yearly time table.. Highly motivational! Keep up the good work!

A truly great app with wonderful & varied quotes that I use daily! I love that I can share these quotes easily, via Messaging, WhatsApp, etc, with friends & family. They've corrected the issue where the quotes were sometimes hard to read because of the colors used in the background. I highly recommend this app!

I love it and I share with my children who are adults now I'm not the only one enjoying it It's January 15th 2020, I still enjoy this app, so very much, it seems that whenever I open up and it always has what I need, even if I don't know what I need. It Inspires me, it makes me think, it makes me feel.

title: Daily Life - My Diary, Journal
description:
Record your daily life!

Record your daily life here and have fun!


[FEATURES]

1. Attach multiple pictures 
2. Search by dates with calendar
3. Password & pin code protection (Support Fingerprint)
4. Support for various font formats (Cute cursive font)
5. Dairy alarm
6. Search entries
7. Hash Tag function 
8. A photo album of recorded pictures
9. Diary data backup function 
 - Export/import daily life data to/from your private Google Drive
10. Setting profile
11. Journals with special places (Include map features)
12. Attach music
13. Export to PDF feature  
14. Pen Drawing feature

This app supports all features of a diary.

Try this beautifully designed diary right now for FREE!


※ We value your personal data. In the case of private posts, they are stored only on your personal device and never stored elsewhere.

recentChanges:
- [Feature Added] Mood emoticon editing function added!
- [Feature Added] Added the function to export recorded entries as a PDF document. (Premium feature)

comments: I've been looking for a simple, yet creative looking diary for a while and Daily Life is the only one that actually feels like writing in a diary! Love the mood option, adding pictures and music is a great option. The interface is easy to use and it can be navigated easily! Would highly recommend if anybody is looking for that perfect journal app! Would like to see more mood options though!

Can you please fix the PDF extraction feature? When extracting to PDF, the photos get cut off and part of the photo is included in another page. It would be good if a photo is fit in one page and not cut in half (cut off faces for example is not really ideal). Overall the app is really good, just need to get the PDF extraction feature fixed to make it perfect.

My fav diary/journal app 😍 I've installed a lots of journal apps and this one is my favorite! It has most of my required features when it comes to journals/diary, but I hope we could add stickers or stamps on our entries for more cuteness. Anyway, it's still awesome and I love it. Looking forward for future updates~

Luv it. One thing, I think would be good if you'd show a simple overview of how it works. Such as once you make an entery how to get back into that same date to add to it. Or anything else that the public my not be aware of.

This is my first time buying a premium. I buy it because of the pdf extract features. But as written in other review as well, the picture will get cut off and part of the picture is included in another pages. Please fix this and I will definitely appreciate about it!

comments: Habitnow is the first todo list with a key feature I've been looking for: to-do items that are automatically created at certain times. As such it is the best such app I've ever used. The only problem is that the author made no provision for hiding completed items. They just hang around cluttering the list--the best it does is move them to the bottom. I find it very odd that anyone would want to stare at completed to-do items. Certainly that shouldn't be the default, but there it is.

I'm very sorry I bought the full version so quickly. The only benefit I found so far, is the ability to add more than 7 habits. I couldn't find a report that would provide information about my success and pinpoint areas that I seem to regularly miss. I was drawn to the simple UI but will probably write this off as a waste of money and return to Daily Tasks.

I was reluctant at first to use this app but now absolutely love it. It's simple yet effective to track your habits and keep on top of to-do list. Truly one of the best app I have used (& I seldom say or write any comments). However, just one niggly point would be the alarm where it doesn't seem to do anything even if I choose to have alarm on the Reminder function. If this could be resolved, it would be awesome and would just go premium!

Love the app. Best of it's kind IMO. Not perfect but so close! This app has the potential to be used for so much more than just habits and tasks! If I may suggest: - having the ".00" digits be optional and not by default when setting/entering goals. - having multiple reminder/notification throughout the day on one habit to enter data multiple times a day (ex: 200 push ups a day, with 4 reminders so I can do 4x50 or something instead of having 4 habits) or the ability to group habits.

I got this app to track my medication and it's perfect! I can set up how I want to take each medicine (yes/no or quantity), see the start date and adherence in the summary view, and even track side effects and effectiveness each day then see them in a chronological list in the sunmary. And the best part is that it's not tied to some medical database! Added bonus: I can track real to-dos as well. Overall, love this app!

title: Daily Bible Verse
description:
The Daily Bible Verse mobile app delivers a new word of God directly to your mobile device each and every day in a simple and easy to read layout. The format of this app is to give you a short and meaningful daily bible verse to give you strength and inspiration every day.

The verses chosen for each day's scripture have spiritual guidance within their own context for a clearer understanding.

- Inspirational scriptures daily from the Holy Bible
- Non-intrusive, user scheduled, daily notification of your scripture
- Choose between bible translations of King James Version (KJV) or New International Version (NIV)
- Share your daily bible verses to Facebook, Google+ and Twitter
- Save and share your favorite scriptures [New]
- Share app with friends to spread the daily word of God

Thank You Users
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Thank you to all the users of The Daily Bible Verse! Thank you for all of the wonderful comments. I can't begin to tell you how powerful and meaningful your words are to us!

Background of Daily Bible Verse
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
As God led the Israelites through the wilderness for 40 years, he provided for their physical nourishment by sending from heaven each morning a grainy white substance called manna which covered the ground like frost and was gathered up by God's people. That story reminds us how God provides for the spiritual nourishment of His people by sending his word from heaven which has been collected in the Bible.

May you be blessed by "Daily Bible Verse"; a daily bite sized chunk of spiritual food for your heart and mind.

comments: i have truly enjoyed my experience with this app. i look forward to each new daily inspiration. it allows me to have a deeper connection with God... it has a clean and simple interface for use and a favorites button to save your favorite verses. a future update i'd like to see made available would be a notes section beneath the daily verse. one could then make notes on every verse or those that inspired them most... thank you for such a thoughtful app!!

The word speaks the truth, it encourages, it strengthens, it reminds you of who you are, it helps you in no matter what situation you are in and it speaks directly to your heart. comments: I like the app but it's missing some key features. I love the category, activity and mood systems, but I need more out of the notes. This app is wonderful. If you want to analyze yourself with a million different spreadsheets and graphics, this is the perfect app! Its seamless, fully customizable, and glitch free! I've been using it daily for over a year and I have not encountered a single issue with this app. It deserves all of the stars!! I love it. Never before have I kept track of my emotions this thoroughly. It has helped me to reflect more and stay in touch with what is going on with me. Being mindful, even if I don't do specific mindfulness exercises. Great app, that got me so hooked that I just had to get the premium features, which make it even more enjoyable. I have, as of today, made it to a 500-day streak of journal entries, no matter how minimal some are, or how long others are. thanks to this app. I've been trying for YEARS to keep a daily journal of some sort-- I tell people in RL about it ALL THE TIME!!! Try it!!! Also, I was really happy to discover, upon getting a new phone recently, that moving all my entries to my new phone was as easy and perfect as... pressing "restore." Wonderful app! Tried several mood trackers, but this one is my favourites. Great visualizations, lots of cute icons for setting custom activities, ability to set custom moods to track, etc. There's also a habit tracker that's well integrated with the mood tracker instead of being completely separate. Strikes the perfect balance between easy to use/customize and functionality. Clear interface that's got an elegant minimalism without being severe.

Being able to highlight in 4 different colors, underline, or bookmark a passage and being able to search through each individual thing that is highlighted, underlined or bookmarked is amazing. I like the fact you can set an alarm for the daily verses so it reminds you to read them. Unfortunately my alarm on mine doesn't always go off, thus the 4 stars.

I love that it has audio reading!! Perfect for when my day gets too busy and I am unable to sit long enough to read. Do laundry, cook, clean, wash dishes or even shower and get your daily Bible reading in. What a blessing 🕊 I am thanking God for this app as we speak!

This app is very easy to use. I love the options to highlight and daily devotionals. I also love the plans mapped out to read the Bible cover to cover will be using one soon. The audio reading option is awesome as well for when my migraines are to bad or I have to much to do to sit and read.

I haven't tried it yet time reviewing everything that's on my phone so if anyone within the app from this day forward can give me the reason RF is beneficial life it's worth it to download it then I will God doesn't charge to watch ads. A little I can see but a lot of these apps really they are getting ridiculous with the ads and they want too much information why you are giving a permission to go into your personal information. God bless good night

title: Always Positive - Daily Motivational Quotes
description:
Great quotes can be inspirational and motivational. You can use quotes to help guide your decisions in life, work and love. 

If you find yourself in a little mid-week or mid-day slump, take a few moments to re-energize yourself with these inspiring quotes. Sometimes, all it takes is a little reminder to boost your spirits and refocus your day.

App also allows you to share positive thought with all the users of this app. Spread the POSITIVITY !!

When you change the quality of your thinking, you change the quality of your life, sometimes instantly.

You have complete control over only one thing in the universe — your thinking! You can decide what you are going to think in any given situation. Your thoughts and feelings determine your actions and determine the results you get. It all starts with your thoughts – and I have found that inspirational words are a quick way to retune your thinking.

Some of the key features of app

1) Daily get new quotes shared by app users.

2) You can also share your positive, motivational,Inspirational and kind words with the world
 and help us to spread the positivity in the world.

3) You can share 
- Quotes image
- Create you own quotes in your own style,  
- Share motivational and inspirational  videos from youtube.
- You can write your positive quotes and thoughts.

4) You can mark as favourite to your favourite quotes

5) Share picture using Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc

Join us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/AlwaysPositiveApp

For any suggestions and feedback. Please write us at feedback.alwayspositive@gmail.com

Love it. I like the short sayings and pass on the longer ones.

title: Daily check: Routine Work
description:
~~ The simple daily routine management app is here!  Roubit ~~

★Description
This is an application that specializes in managing your daily routines.
There are absolutely no useless features in this app.
If you want to create a routine task, it's as simple as tapping the plus button.
To remove a routine task, simply press and hold the task in the list.

By creating daily routines, you can form good habits that will change your life.

★Usage example
・Your favorite weekly TV shows
・Weekly magazine releases

recentChanges: Fix minor bugs
comments: I love the concept of this app, and it's simple clean look, BUT it has some major issues with maintaining what I check off and the order I organize my tasks. Maybe there should be a "custom" option in the drop box that asks how to organize the tasks. I really hope this gets fixed asap, or I'll have to find another app.

Excellent App. It has all the little features that the user needs to make checklists, and the added notification feature is very useful. Would recommend for anyone who wants to organize their days and not forget what they need to do!

It would work great if it did what it said. But it ticks and unticks whatever it likes. I'm using it for checking off exercises. I know i didn't do any on Sunday and Monday. Yet the calender says i did a lot. Very annoying. I'm waiting for it to get fixed. In the meantime in looking for a similar app.
This app is AWESOME!!! I am one VERY lazy gal and I use to have a HORRIBLE routine but this app has helped me get a good routine. Would definitely recommend!!
This app is so good! But could be better! The "Start time" and "End time" should be timer and it alarms so that the user knows the exact hours or minutes they put in a certain task/list.

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced—there are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as “Works with Google Fit”,“Top Developer”,“Clear Your Mind， Engage Your Body”, “Keep Calm & Carry On” in Google Play, 
Voted as” Best Yoga App” of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the “5 Addictive Fitness Apps”.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal 
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don’t like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits 
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it! 

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Daily Yoga. New classes uploaded!

Solfeggio Meditations is a series of six meditation recordings teaching by Glenn Harrold in English. You will have the potential to release deep-rooted blockages and negative patterns of behavior with it.

Plus:

comments: The only thing I didn't like is that all of the body toning sessions and most of the others are only for the pro users and I wanted something free since I'm just a student. But otherwise for the few free sessions I really like the app it's easy to follow and I really love that there are options to choose what you want to work on: beginners, weight loss, body toning etc.

Things I don't like: Can't listen to my yoga Playlist along side this app. No heart points get rewarded. The free version is littered with ads. A yoga version of candy crush. Things I do like: Incredibly thorough. Easy to understand. Even though I've been doing yoga for years, I learned different nuances of poses in just one session. Yoga for ALL levels of abilities.

I am new to yoga so I decided to try this app furst before joining a class. First week and the workouts are really great. You can pick whichever type of class you want. Beginners to Advanced. Also has a lot of meditation that work great for relaxing. I paid for the year so its a little pricey but they gave me 60% off. Not so bad. I think its worth the $$$ as long as you use. Its a personal yoga session in your home... Namaste : )

Excellent app. Guided yoga routines and meditation. I'm really impressed as I thought it would be difficult to do but they are guided. Slightly annoying that the majority of courses you have to pay for, but there you go. Fun stretches and relaxing meditation sounds. Thanks

This should keep me on track. I've been into yoga in the past but have slowly strayed away from practice. In one short session, my forward fold improved and I was able to severely release undo tension in my lower back, my calves and my shoulders. Definitely need to work on opening my chest and shoulders. Looking forward to tomorrow's session!

title: Fabulous: Daily Motivation
description:
▌ Winner of Google's Material Design Award for Most Charming Engagement
 
▌ Nominated for Google Play’s Best App Award
 
▌ Incubated at Duke University Behavioral Economics Lab
 
Fabulous is not just your average habit tracker! We’re a science-based app that will motivate you to improve your fitness & achieve your weight loss goals, reboot your sleep cycle, and discover mindfulness to reduce your anxiety. You’ll learn to build a transformative morning routine and even pick up life-changing habits like meditation and yoga along the way.
 
Our ultimate goal is to instill habits that improve your health.
 
Using any random habit tracker to pick up a habit like yoga, meditation, or to serve as a reminder to workout never works. This is why we’ll act as your life coach, building your motivation so you can focus on developing habits that reduce mental health issues like anxiety, and improve your daily productivity.
 
Upgrade your planner for an exciting new habit tracker and achieve your health and productivity goals today.
 
Use Fabulous for motivation to build a refreshed morning routine, exercise, improve your sleep cycle, and lose weight. Start by instilling these healthy living habits that will improve your mental health and keep you on top of your goals.
 
Like we said, Fabulous is not just your average habit tracker. Fabulous is your motivation to workout and lose weight, your morning routine jump start, your mindfulness app to help you relax and focus, and so much more.
 
▌TOP 6 REASONS TO USE FABULOUS
 
★ Have an irregular sleep cycle and want to learn how to get a good night sleep?
★ Struggling with your fitness and don’t know how to lose weight?
★ Need motivation to build an indestructible morning routine?
★ Want to increase your energy so you have focus the entire day?
★ Find it difficult improving your productivity because ADHD?
★ Want to improve your mental health through mindfulness so you can cope with anxiety?
 
▌INTEGRATED HEALTH SESSIONS
 
Take your fitness & workout routine to the next level by trying our integrated exercise sessions. We’ll coach you through each of our sessions and more!
 
★ 7-minute scientific workout to improve your fitness so you can lose weight
★ Zen and vipassana meditation for high anxiety and mindfulness
★ Deep work and power nap sessions for productivity and focus
★ Stretching starter pack for total flexibility  
★ Yoga exercises to reduce anxiety and improve your mental health
 
After you’ve created your morning routine, you’ll begin to receive personalized vocal advice from your own personal life coach based on your everyday habits.
 
▌HOW FABULOUS WORKS
 
★ Smart-targeted health advice to develop an exercise routine and improve your fitness 
★ Science-based habit tracker focused on health and mindfulness
★ Weight loss workouts that don’t just rely on counting calories (based off the Atkins & HCG diet)
★ Your own personal 1:1 life coach for motivation to achieve your goals
★ Integrated health sessions for meditation and relaxation, yoga, exercise and more
★ Tools to improve your sleep cycle so you can have a good night sleep
★ Expansive library to improve your productivity & focus, and build a successful morning routine
 
▌GET IN TOUCH!
 
We're always happy to talk with you and hear how fabulous has improved your mental health and helped you achieve your goals from meditation to weight loss, and so much more!

Shoot us an email at hello@thefabulous.co
Like us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/thefabulous.co
Follow us on Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/thefabstory/

recentChanges: We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Fabulous features. Thanks for using Fabulous!
comments: Overall, it has been a gentle and positive "voice" with me; it is a supportive and encouraging presence. The steps are slowly layered allowing time to build good and healthy habits. I can add them when feeling confident to take the next step knowing that this next step, or habit, isn't going to be overwhelming to achieve.

So I'm a premium subscriber, the idea of the app is great, but the app is quite buggy. For example: - backup and restoring on another device doesn't works (backup not found, but same account?) - syncing between devices should be a given (to have a DnD device without usual email, WhatsApp disturbances before the day starts, evening), doesn't exist - ofen returning from floating head, screen is just white (until you press back often enough to jump out of the routine) - you can't end challenges

I like the steady pace and the small steps. They help to accomplish tasks during the day that I could otherwise forget. This app is good for people who find themselves wasting time and are clueless of where to start. The only con I can see is that this isn't for type A, energetic or lively people. IMO

Useless app, charged during trial, won't refund. I got charged on the day 1 of 14 day FREE trial. The app consists of long reads in a condescending tone that repeat you name every other sentence. It is a cheap trick from sales, but how much is much? I promise you, Reader, they will pose your name, Reader, everywhere, Reader. The customer support is useless, they have even a process for refunds - but safe your time, any option will lead you to "we are sorry, it's your fault, bye".

DO NOT download this app. Do not sign up for a free trial. Don't even look into it. I signed up for a free trial and was immediately charged for a full year. I contacted them for a refund and they said Google Play takes care of that. I contacted Google Play and they said they have nothing to do with refunds as the money went to this app. If I could take stars away from this app I would. Update: As you have continued to ignore my request I have claimed your charge as fraud.

title: I am - Daily affirmations reminders for self care
description:
How many negative thoughts have been endlessly repeating in your mind?  Daily affirmations help rewire our brains, build self esteem and change negative thought patterns. Empower yourself by verbally affirming your dreams and ambitions. Choose from many daily intentions and set reminders to be delivered throughout the day.

Positive affirmations not only do they help make major shifts in your mindset they also serve as prompts and daily reminders on what you are truly capable of, making sure you have an amazing day, everyday.

An affirmation is a simple but powerful statement that helps to strengthen the connection between your unconscious mind and your conscious mind.
The more you strengthen this connection the more resilient you will be when difficult or challenging circumstances.

As Buddha wisely said: you become what you believe.

And the best way strengthen your resilience is to practice affirmations every single day.
There are so many benefits of using affirmations as part of your daily morning routine:

- They help increase your awareness of your thoughts and words making it easier to recognize the negative + self-doubt thought patterns holding you back. 

- Affirmations define your focus. When you focus your energy on the things you want: achieving your goals, the positive, uplifting + good you are creating an abundance mindset and strengthening your resolve to make it happen. 

- They open you up to possibility. Too often we get stuck in the ‘impossible’ mindset, but affirmations flip this on its head. When you begin to positively affirm what is actually possible, a whole world of opportunity opens up to you.

recentChanges: We updated the design and added a Spanish version of the app. Hope you enjoy!
comments: DON'T INSTALL!!! The app didn't give me 3 days free trial and immediately charged me upon setup!!! There are similar apps for free with better quality. Don't bother with this one!!

Positive reinforcement when needed. I have shared this program with my friends and family. It is unfortunate that premium is pricey for PTSD veterans but the free app works great. Like I said, positive reinforcement as needed.👍♥️

The app is ok and I've liked it so far but I've been trying and failing to cancel my free trial. There's no "help" option on the app which is where I usually get info about things like these and now they've charged my account for a premium that I wasn't prepared to pay. When I go to my Google account it says subscription cancelled and yet I get a notification everyday that my account has been charged EDIT : issue has been resolved, thanks.
I would've gave it 5 stars, but its not free! The app itself is a gem. I simply love it, and the purpose it serves!
Please include the function to record your own affirmations...and have options for background music! In this way the app can also be used for meditation!

title: Inspiring Bible Verses Daily
description:
Praise the Lord!
Keep close to God. Read Bible verses on a daily basis.

"Inspiring Bible Verses Daily" app features

-	Most well-known Bible verses, scriptures, passages, quotations
-       Read the whole chapter or even more
-       Choose between NIV and KJV in the Setting menu
-	Stunning background photos of God's inspiring creation
-	Swipe left or right to navigate past verses
-	Simple scheduling a daily reminder
-	Share your favorite Bible verses with friends through Facebook, Instagram, Twitter,  text, email, Google+ or many other apps.
-       Make font size bigger or smaller using pinch zoom gesture  or scrollbar in Setting
-       Simple and beautiful User Interface

Reading bible verse a day helps you to keep filled with the power of our sovereign God, to continue your path of faith,  rekindle your love for Jesus Christ and stay connected to God.

This app can be useful for your church bible studies, bible studies for women and even for kids. 

Look for verses for strength, faith, wisdom or any other keyword using Search feature.
Pause a moment and find out a verse for the day everyday with inspirational pictures.

Praise the Lord. God is good.

* Special thanks to the generous and talented photographers that have allowed us to use their photography.

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: Very nice app to provide a scripture verse every day. The verse can be expanded to display the entire chapter to see the proper context. The hamburger menu on the lower left provides additional resources such as an exegesis of the passage and a short prayer based on it. Many other features in the settings are available for customizing font, language etc. It's part of my daily routine every morning.

In addition to the daily verse, I like that it's easy to read more of that chapter. I also like the new prayer that goes along with the daily verse now! The daily devotion is a great addition too! I have not read the devotion as often yet, but it doesn't seem to coordinate with the daily verse. That is okay, it's still nice that it's offered now! Thank you!

Love this app! Just what I needed... Quick verse can open to the book it's from and there is a daily prayer and devotion each day to go with that verse. It also has many options in settings such as a daily reminder time and text size, etc.
Thank you for making this app. Is it possible to pop up the daily verse to my screen even if it is lock? I am contented the overall of the app even without purchasing. Best of luck for the team. ❤️🙏
I found the app easy to use, inspirational & comforting. I love the prayers, devotionals & the easy access to the bible. This app is much appreciated.😀

title: Daughters of the King Daily Devotionals
description:
The mission of Daughters of the King Daily Devotionals is to inspire women around the world, to pray for revival among us and to encourage unity. Through our daily devotional ministry, which is Daughters of the King Daily Devotionals, we reach hundreds of thousands of readers throughout the world every day and have received countless testimonies of spiritual growth and transformation in the lives of many.
______
App Permissions: While the app asks for permissions, we do not in any way violate the privacy of our users. Our app developing company has expressed that these permissions are necessary for the app to function properly.

summary: Daughters of the King Daily Devotional, the best daily devotional for women.
recentChanges: Latest news updates, bug fixes, Google policy compliance for 2019!
comments: An "On Time Word" Word ..Everytime ! I was skeptical that this app would be like the "same old song and dance" devotional apps BUT when I tell you there is Anointing all over it . The daily devotionals always meet me right where I need it . I'm in a season of spiritual growth and drawing closer than ever before to God . Along with my Bible and journal , Daughters of the King Daily Devotionals are apart of the way my Father chooses to speak to me ! The plans and bible are the cherry on top !

I LOVE this app! Its my favorite app on my phone! I look forward to waking up in the morning and the FIRST thing I do is read the daily devotion and mediate on HIS word! It uplifts my day, my spirit and this app is truely a blessing. Thank you to DOTK for your dailys. You words fill me with the holy spirit and im so thankful and grateful for you!
Love the contents bad app. The app will not open for me especially in the last 2 months. I have uninstall and them install it again. This is the only app I have that will not open.
I went from being able to share this app with everyone, to not being able to share with anyone via my text messages. Not sure if anyone else is having this issue
I love the Devotionals, but I'm not liking the app. It's not opening as it used to be before. It takes longer than 10 mts. One thing I agree is this devotional speaks to me everytime I'm down.

title: Word of the day — Daily English dictionary app
description:
Tired of your friends' speech full of smart words? Using Webster dictionary while reading the news? 

Become smarter than others! Get to know “Word of the Day”!

Simple application with all you need to challenge your brain every day! Expand your vocabulary each day with interesting word, clear definition, memorable example and pronunciation for every taste. There is no other better way to improve your native language vocabulary – one small app on your phone for your best vocabulary expansion without using thousands of workbooks, thesaurus, articles and dictionaries.

Forget about vocabulary building applications, incomprehensible definitions, famous dictionaries, - all you need to know more is to put “Download” bottom! Easy way to improve and expand your vocabulary daily! 

“Word of the Day” is: 
• One new word every day from the best sources to build your better vocabulary 
• Pleasant to use  interface where you won’t find anything disposable
• Native speaking pronunciation (possibility to choose sounding depending on your taste):
switch between a good number of voices with a choice of what English version to hear. Choose between English US (Male, Female), British English - UK (Male, Female), Canadian English (Male, Female), Australian English (Male, Female) or EN India (Male, Female).
• Mark the words you would like to remember 
• Share the most interesting with your friends  
• Become sexier by impressing other people with your speech.

Every daily word is taken from the best sources and giving to you with the simplest definition and bright clear example to improve your English vocabulary. Simple widget with pronunciation guarantees you the correct usage. 

Scientists say that if to learn one new English word each day your brain acts faster and feels healthier.

“Word of the Day” is created by people to the people.

recentChanges:
In this global update, we’ve improved performance and fixed all the key errors and crashes. Widget and pronunciation are working perfectly now. The app is stable as a mountain. In addition to that, the app has got a new fresh look.

We hope you would appreciate this update and correct your previous review.
comments: It is perfect for adding new words to my everyday conversations. Do often i run out of new ways to describe my thoughts. I am also a writer and love to be reminded of just one new word a day, instead of becoming overwhelmed by studying an entire dictionary..

This is a wonderful app. It understands your learning speed and then suggests some words. It has many a thing that includes idioms,phrases,new words and much more. I suggest this app especially foir those who wish to fall in love with English! :)
I enjoy receiving new vocabulary words daily. The enjoyment comes from learning the correct pronunciation and using the words in the right context.
Too many adverts. To view a definition of a word you have to watch an advert first. That gets tedious very quickly. Spoils what would be a good, informative app. Shame.
Ads are ruining my experience. Within seconds after opening the app, ads pops up which takes up the whole screen and cannot be closed easily. Used to like this app when the ads were not this bad.

title: Diary with lock
description:
Use this diary app to make your own personal notes of daily events, appointments, secrets and feelings.


FEATURES:
• Password & pin code protection
• Emojis via Quick access keyboard (requires Android 4.1 or higher)
• Personalize background color (Pink, Purple, Blue, ++)
• Change text-size and font-style
• Reminder
• Easy to use
• Search
• Download backup (as text-file)
• Sync between devices
• Private & Secure cloud storage
• The most downloaded diary app on Google Play!


Build from the ground up to be simple and user friendly, the user interface is designed to allow you to enter new notes quickly and easily. With this Diary you can write all your private notes and secure them with a pin code.


Track and write about your daily activities 
Make it a habit to quickly write one or more mini-notes during your day. Simply leave a few words about your workout session, what happened at school or in the office during your day. In weekends, you can write about all the fun you had walking your dog, meeting with friends, or being social with your family. This can be the daily activity log you always have wanted. Make it your personal journal and have fun reading it over in few year, and share a few laughs with your friends. As this app is pure textual, and contains no images or photos, it runs ultra fast and smooth on any Android device, and consumes minimal of available memory and disk-space!

Emojis
If your Android phone support it, you can use emojis in all entries. Decorate diary notes with beautiful heart and love emojis, or popular sport or emotional face smileys. If the phone does not yet have native support for this, we recommend you try downloading a third party emoji keyboard from Google Play.

Bring your diary in your pocket!
In 2016 it is simple for everybody to become a lifetime diarist. Follow millions of people, join this popular diary trend.

This diary is perfect to use as:



Write your own Autobiography
This diary app can easily fit the purpose of a writing down your memoir or chronicle. Keep a log or logbook to record history. Make a habit of doing daily records, document your life in your own daybook.

Setup a reminder to alert you when it is time to write. Protect all personal notes by adding a pin code when it starts up. Never worry about losing memories again. Easily send a backup of diary entries directly to email for extra protection.

comments: Honestly, if i was allowed to give this zero stars i would! I can't log back into my account even though i reseted my pass! I lost everything i wrote! I had this app for a year! And imagine 365 days of personal info, gone.... I also suffer from short term memory loss, so this app was useful until i lost everything. I hope you guys are working on my problem!

I love this game but it is missing something... NOTHING I love it so much heart heart 💓❤️ make more games like this I love it! Especially when it had secret lock on it. This is the best game ever I just don't know how to describe it! Are you going to make other games like this? ❤️ Something important to write in the diary is my favorite parts ! So I wonder if I can change my password on the app😄. Please make more games like this. This game is the best game I ever had lately! I'm sad kids hate

I loved the app!! But I had to reset my phone for some reasons. When I installed the app again, I couldn’t sign into my acc as I forgot my password too. I had saved so many things in the app. It's showing 'Email is not verified ' again and again. How can I get my account back?? Can you please help me with THIS?? (I did email for verifying my account 2days ago, it's not working yet. I checked spam folder too but there was nothing) I would probably cry if I don’t get back my account 😭😭

This app has been amazing! I love all the features but I really like the privacy it provides for your secrets and personal stuff. I hope that this app continues to grow because it has a LOT more potential!! 🥰 I think this may be one of the (very little)apps I will use long term! I drift from app to app but this has been the best of any of the others!! Keep making great progress app creators!!(or creator)

title: Morning and Evening Devotional - Daily Bible Free
description:
Daily Reading with C.H. Spurgeon - Morning and Evening Devotionals

In this app you also find Holy Bible, Reading Plans, Daily Verses, Audio Bible and more!

This devotional has a morning and evening meditation for every day of the year. Although these devotions are short in length, they are filled with spiritual goodness. 

In just a few sentences, C.H. Spurgeon is able to convey the wisdom of Scripture with eloquence and purpose. These daily messages provide Christians with the spiritual energy they need to begin and end each day. Spurgeon weaves a verse of Scripture into each devotion, helping readers draw deeper meaning out of the selected passages. 

I hope you find this app great for your Daily Devotional!
descriptionHTML:
Daily Reading with C.H. Spurgeon - Morning and Evening Devotionals

In this app you also find Holy Bible, Reading Plans, Daily Verses, Audio Bible and more!

This devotional has a morning and evening meditation for every day of the year. Although these devotions are short in length, they are filled with spiritual goodness.

In just a few sentences, C.H. Spurgeon is able to convey the wisdom of Scripture with eloquence and purpose. These daily messages provide Christians with the spiritual energy they need to begin and end each day. Spurgeon weaves a verse of Scripture into each devotion, helping readers draw deeper meaning out of the selected passages.

I hope you find this app great for your Daily Devotional!
summary: C. Spurgeon - Morning and Evening: Daily Bible Devotional App, Free and Offline
recentChanges: we fixed crashes and improved performance in Daily Devotional Bible
comments: best devotional application ever. I use this for my devotions everyday. I have a skill for my Alexa device which allows it to read the devotional to me. While my device reads this to me I follow along with my tablet.
Thanks. An exceptionally works. I miss nothing. I have a preview of all my readings, or turn to the next program easily for control purposes.
Totally amazed at the quality of this app! Will definitely purchase the no ad version! A KJV Bible, C.H. Spurgeon's M/E, plus reading plans at this price? Outstanding value! God richly bless you!
Love having the Bible at my fingertips and the highlighting feature. Love the KJV. Other versions seem watered down.
Its so easy and works better. I thank God i found it. But there should prayer points to backup the scripture.

title: Life Hack Tips - Daily Tips for your Life
description:
This life tips app is a free and easy-to-use application contains tons of life tips in different categories such as technology tricks, health and drinks, money savers, etc. With these life tips you can learn a lot of knowledge and tricks to make your life easier and happier. You will find this app very helpful, and also you can share the life tips with your classmates, or friends via Facebook, WhatsApp and other social apps easily. Here are some tips for example:

1. Take a sip of coffee before adding sugar, you won't need as much sugar for it to taste as sweet afterwards.
2. Using your phone while it's charging can damage the battery. This is why the cords for chargers are so short.

comments: This app is amazing! It does exactly what it claims to. The only slightly downfall is there are ads, but they are not for games and stuff, but rather neat things! But when there are ads, the little "x" is big enough to hit and it dosnt send you to the app store every time! I do have a suggestion though. Maybe put in some tips for tablet users? Most of the device related ones are for phones or computers. Thank you! Keep up the great work!

My biggest concern is that about 30% of the (tech) hacks are out of date and don't work (there's no way to flag them afaik), another 10% are pure speculation with no proof, 5% are old wives tales that don't work (tried them years ago). There are a lot I was unaware of that are pretty cool. But more than not, I was a little unimpressed. Excellent effort, clean interface, category choices, easy nav... the app is really great otherwise. Update the info and easy 5 stars.

Alot of fun to find out new things especially when they are so simple. But however people like pictures as well. So my suggestion would be to Life Hacks is to spruce it up some with some colorful pictures of some kind. This will keep the interest going even further as to what else is there to know??? Attention spand is MANDATORY in educating yourself.

Absolutely, it is an amazing app. Beneficial, offline , no irritating adds (depends)and it's completely free! Give it a try and install this app you won't regret. Tips that this app recommends you will be helpful in different fields that we are getting involved with them in our daily life and although help's you to keep your mood and self confidence okay 👍. Personally, I do appreciate the developers effort for making this wonderful app. Looking forward for new updates and new tips!

Listen I've always enjoyed what I've seen things you people so just finding the app I'm going to install it now.. always seemed to find interesting useful things from these folks. I remember one of the finest quotes I ever saw was I think a former head of the patent office way back in the 1800s said everything that is important has been created already,. Anything that helps me go opposite that kind of thinking that's the way I lean but of course "trust but verify."

title: Daily Bible Inspirations
description:
Get inspirational, uplifting Bible verses – complete with stunning photos – delivered to your Android device daily. No Internet needed. FREE!

Install the totally FREE app that’s packed with:

✓ Powerful verses curated by an ordained pastor 
✓ Beautiful images that will lift your spirit 
✓ Easy social sharing from inside the app 
✓ Simple daily scheduling, so you can get your daily bread any time of day

Available in English, with Spanish and Korean translations.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

♥ ♥ ♥ 1000s of tweets and Facebook posts daily! 

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

This is the perfect app for you if you are a busy parent, a grandparent, a new Christian, a student… or anyone that wants to reconnect with God on a daily basis but may not always have time for daily devotions.

comments: I read a bible verse as part of my daily prayer and meditation routine. Other apps give readers more insight/teaching points regarding the verse rather than only reading it.The app has a connection for verse discussion but this feature doesn't work. It does have a good selection of verses with music and nice backgrounds if this is what you are looking for in an app.
The Android version only has bible verses where the iPhone has daily prayers. The two versions should be the same. My friend posts the prayers on FB. I'm disappointed in this version.
Very useful... Because this apps give me an inspiration insight in my life. I Love reading daily verses in terms of God's word.

My only complaint is that the background pictures often blend with the words of the verse. Forcing me to "guess" the word blending into the picture. Not a user friendly feature. I despise flashing ads. I don't mind ads and certainly would not pay to remove them. However, I will never look at or purchase any product with a flashing ad. A stagnate ad I would consider buying product. I cover the flashing ads with my fingers. Very annoying ! Love the daily verses.
The app does give very inspirational battle quotes. however in difficult to select and keep my favorite version as the one that always displays. Other than that you guys do a great job.

title: Daily Postcard
description:
[ Daily Postcard ]

- By this app you will see Post Birds are delivering your post cards.

- By Post Bird, you can send and receive a postcard to people around the world with messages and a picture.

- Introduce yourself to your profile information by voice.

- Try select a picture from default gallery or select your own picture to decorate a postcard to send.

- Try find new friends with similar interest or different nationalities, age group, gender, and etc. 

- Don’t be shy to talk to international friends! Free translating function can help you to read postcard messages in your own language.

- You can keep selected postcards from your friends or the ones with fancy pictures.

- Filtering function can help you to block receiving postcard that you no longer want to receive. ( Filtering will not block postcards from your own senders or replies )

- You can set a time for Do-Not-Disturb-Me to turn off postcard receiving alarms. 


*** Try now to send your postcard free!  ***


[ Help ]

ghplanet.com@gmail.com


[ Service Access Rights Guide ]

# Daily Postcard requires the following additional privileges.

- Optional
• CAMERA - This is the right to use when taking pictures for postcards, profiles, feeds, and talks.
• RECORD_AUDIO - This is the privilege you need to record your voice profile to introduce you to the other person.

- Required
• WRITE / READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Permission to read and write configuration information used in the app, or to save photos.

comments: Easy and fun to use. I've been using it for six days and have met a number of new friends. It has a convenient translate option so everyone can use their mother tongue. The only drawback is that a conversation takes longer than other apps because it relies on first a notification, then open, then open the mailbox, then open the postcard. Other apps the next message can be accessed directly from the notification.

I think it's a great app! Simple but not any less entertaining. However, I always have trouble whenever I try to log in to my old account or even sign up with a new one. I can't find any feature in the app that provides information about how to proceed in this kind of situation, and that makes it extremely frustrating to attempt to use it. Overall, I consider this app to be great, but I do think that some kind of 'Help Center' should be added in order to make it easier to use.

I love this app so much! 🥰 But yesterday I pressed something by mistake on my old account, that I to email the people from people from this app and spoke to them and they couldn't help me recover my old account so I I had to make a new a new one 🥺💔, I'm kinda sad cause I lost contact with all the great friends I made an in my old account, is there anyway I can get in contact with them, I'm trying to reach them by sending the bird out and them a message. 🥺🥺

This app is amazing, bit there are many paedophiles on there that I report but they keep coming back, there's also horny people who will try take advantage of me.. I barely met anyone normal, otherwise the app is fun but I dislike the fact y0u have to watch an ad to post a picture, otherwise, this app is great but some people ruin the experience.

I have sent around 10 or more postcards via postbird, but I haven't received a reply from any of them! I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app, but I still have this issue. Please look into this because I used to love this app.

description:
A 365 day devotional app based on an inspiring collection of bible verses, prayer, poems, and quotations from Leaves of Life by Margaret Bird Steinmetz updated with digital features for today's smartphones and tablets.

Daily Prayer is a daily devotional and prayer guide based on Leaves of Life; a compilation of bible verses, prayer, poems, and quotations from famous authors, writers and poets including Ralph Waldo Emerson, John Ruskin, Robert Browning, William Shakespeare, Alfred Tennyson, Goethe, James Russell Lowell, Henry W. Be encouraged to read God's Word and pray daily by using this daily devotional app.

title: List:Daily Checklist
description:
Welcome Goal Achiever!

This Apps' mission is to encourage, support, and reward you for taking meaningful daily action towards the attainment of your goals, big or small. To help you take consistent action long after the excitement you felt when you committed to a worthy goal has faded.

One of the reasons you might not be successful at reaching a goal is because you did not take consistent and sustained action for a long enough period of time.

This checklist was especially created to help you take daily consistent action over time.

"For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent." - Tony Robbins

"...we have to make good decisions, use discipline and be consistent for long enough to see the results we desire." - Darren Hardy


The idea is simple:
1. Enter the actions you know you have to take daily to reach a goal. Like: Workout for 40 minutes, make 10 cold calls to prospective customers, send out 10 resumes to potential employers, write at least 10 pages for project, etc.

2. Put the widget on your home screen. When an action is not yet completed it shows up in bright colored text. Once you check an action off the list the text becomes a lighter color.

3. Your daily mission now becomes to see the list go from bright (in the morning) to gray (before going to bed). You can instantly see how far down your action list you are at a glance. This color change also signals that you had a successful day. A day in which you accomplished all the actions you needed to take you one day closer to your ultimate goals.

A successful day, with all items checked, results in a green check mark placed on the calendar. Watching a series of check marks fill up the calendar, helps motivate you to stay consistent. 

There is an indicator on the main list screen that shows the number of consecutive successful days. This is your success streak. A streak with seven or more days turns this indicator green. This gives additional motivation for consistency.

The home screen widget also serves as a constant reminder of the actions you need to take today. Each time you use your Android device you'll see the list and the amount of actions remaining.

In short: Don't go to bed if your list is not completed. If bedtime is near and your list is not close to completion, get to work on what is left on the list!

Note: This version has a limit of 4 goals and an unlimited number of actions.

If you have any questions or comments send an email to:
checklist.help@gmail.com

Ideas for Uses:
- Goal achievement
- Motivation
- Build and re-enforce good habits
- Behavior modification
- Build discipline
- Daily to do list

Features:
- Simple visual design to remind you of your success actions
- Number of unchecked high priority items displayed at top of on screen widget
- Priority indicator to designate importance of items
- Priority significance chooser. Allows you to specify which priority level items need to be checked to gain a daily check mark
- A variety of text and background color choices
- Change text size of list and widget
- Alert on individual list items
- Automatic daily list reset at a time you specify. You dictate when your day ends
- Cloud Sync your List to other Android devices

Permissions:
- Contacts: Find accounts on the device – Needed to connect to Google Firebase for Cloud Sync
- Storage: Modify/Delete SD card contents - Backup and restore database to SD card

comments: Normally works fine but sometimes a new day starts and it still has stuff completed from the day before. It only happens a few times a month. Very useful app for me. I need to take medicine once a day and do a series of stretches a few times a day for a medical condition. This app helps me keep track of what i have and haven't done. It would also be useful to have an option to make a task that should be completed once every X days. Like go on a walk (etc) every 3 days.

This is just what I needed. A little difficult to learn where to find certain features (select days, task sort, etc), but now I see it has them. I may get paid version so I can sync to desktop making it easier to adjust tasks and goals. Thank you, developers. Suggest add ability to make goal with no end date.
It seems ok, but the UI is confusing. How do you mark that you've achieved a goal for the day? I've switched to a different app.
A few tiny things I would change, but a pretty good and useful app. Very happy with it.
Deleting an action from my goal deletes it from my calender history too, eventhough I have explicitly unchecked "delete from history" option. I am so upset that I have lost the record of my progress.

title: Daybook - Diary, Journal, Note
description:
Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way.

WHY USE DAYBOOK? 

• SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way. Thus helps to record memories in an organized manner.

• SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected. 

• EASY-TO-USE:  It's easy-to-use, straightforward journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience — nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily.

• ONE TIME SINGLE SIGN-ON: Why bother having to remember yet another login details? One time Sign in using Gmail/facebook/email id per device enables it to be a journal diary with a password. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on.

• FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app. 

• SPEAK TO WRITE DIARY: Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI.

• MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases.
- As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life.
- As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly. 
- As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app.
- As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal.
- As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save!
- As a Class notebook: For educational purpose, use it as -  homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures
- As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly. 
- As a pocket diary and a note keeper app: Record your life journey. Daybook is a life diary that works with multiple platforms such as Web, mobile, through voice Assistance.

Standout features:

- Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance. 
- Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant


Upcoming integration:

We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app.

- Daily Mood tracker for the diary
- Search based on tags or location
- Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup
