descriptionHTML:
Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way.

WHY USE DAYBOOK?

• SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way. Thus helps to record memories in an organized manner.

• SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected.

• EASY-TO-USE: It's easy-to-use, straightforward journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience — nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily.

• ONE TIME SINGLE SIGN-ON: Why bother having to remember yet another login details? One time Sign in using Gmail/facebook/email id per device enables it to be a journal diary with a password. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on.

• FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app.

• SPEAK TO WRITE DIARY: Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI.

• MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases.
- As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life.
- As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly.
- As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app.
- As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal.
- As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save!
- As a Class notebook: For educational purpose, use it as - homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures
- As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly.
- As a pocket diary and a note keeper app: Record your life journey. Daybook is a life diary that works with multiple platforms such as Web, mobile, through voice Assistance.

Standout features:

- Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance.
- Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant


Upcoming integration:

We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app.

- Daily Mood tracker for the diary
- Search based on tags or location
- Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup


To know more, visit us at https://daybook.app.

Follow us on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/DayBook.diary/


Feedback:
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at daybook.diary@gmail.com

comments: A great journal that is user friendly & free. I checked out several apps but this one was the best one for me. You do not lose content even without having to save it. Been using it for over a month & no complaints whatsoever. Plus no advertisements to interrupt or distract you. It even sends you a reminder if you haven't written in your journal today. Thanks Daybook!
It's great. Easy to use, has a dark mode and the reminders have helped me stay up to date with my journal entries

I wanted a simple, adless journal with no frills. This app delivered. There probably are some nice features for those who want them, but if you just want to be able start tracking your daily thoughts with no distractions, then paying for this app is a great choice. Oh, and there's a dark theme. Any app with a dark theme is a winner in my book.

I've only used it to record one day's events and I'm feeling refreshed already. I've never tried writing things down when I'm annoyed or sad and so far it appears to have worked. Not a fan of actually writing myself but this is a perfect compromise between letting it out and not writing with a physical pen.

Just found your app and it seems to be exactly what I needed! Plus thank you so much for not bombarding your app with ads. One feature I'd love to have: I like tracking the progress I make with projects, so it'd be cool if I could see which story is related to which project. For example, adding a tag to a story and finding all the tag-related stories by search

title: Daily Raffle
description:
Daily Raffle is a Risk-Free app with a daily prizes up to 1000$.

This is not like any other game, the chances to win are very high! Each tickets consists of 6 numbers between 1 and 9, to win your numbers should match at least the first 4 in the same order of the ticket shown in the Results.

Daily Raffle is Free and does not require any in-app purchases.

You can transfer the money to your PayPal account or Bitcoin wallet.

The Winner ticket is randomly generated before the draw starts, its hash will be shown in the Results page. At the end of the day the winner ticket will be revealed with the key that was used to hash it. You can verify the integrity of the result by using the numbers of the ticket and hash it with the key given at the end using HMAC-SHA512 Algorithm.

Social Media:
Facebook: @dailyraffleapp
Instagram: @dailyraffleapp

title: Daily Budget
description:
Daily Budget ensures that you always have enough money for the things you need and the things that are important to you!

Daily Budget lets you know how much money you can spend here and now!


EASY TO USE!
*******************

No overly complicated statistics or forms to fill out!

Easy and understandable design!

With the Daily Budget app you can easily control your daily spendings based on your income and expenses.

Creating a budget can be intimidating, but the financial benefits are huge. With Daily Budget its easier than ever to get started.

Following a budget will also keep you out of debt or help you work your way out of debt if you are currently in debt.

Taking the time to set create a budget is one of the top financial tips by most financial advisors.

Daily budget also provides saving tips that can help you achieve your financial goals.

HOW
**************

Start by entering your regular income and expenses.

Based on your income and expenses, you get your Daily amount, which shows your daily earnings.

Every day your Daily amount is automatically added to your Current balance. 
Your Current balance shows how much money you can afford to spend at any time

By keeping track of your spendings you can easily see if you are within you own budget.

Daily Budget lets you see how much money you have spent and how much you can afford to spend every day!

Statistics show where you spend your money and lets you see where you can improve.


PREMIUM
*************
Upgrading to premium includes the following:
- No more ads
- A widget, making it even easier to keep track
- More statistics
- All saving tips


We would love your feedback to help improve the app! 
Please leave a review or send us an email directly.

Thank you for downloading Daily Budget!

comments: Super powerful saving concept, but packed up in a simple user experience. Used to use something similar on Apple and finally found one on Android. Feature suggestion: a savings goal function which allocates a portion of your daily budget until it's met.

It's so simple. Set up how much discretionary spending you can afford each month, and this gives you a total for each day. Surpluses accrue, deficits accrue, and it always gives you something to work towards. Spend less and the number goes higher!

Absolutely has everything you need, except calculates the wrong numbers.... Put in the income and it shows it as 200+ more on the monthly total and expenses were also more than the actual total amount. It's hard to make corrections if the data it's telling you is off.

I've been using this app for a long time. I love the way that you can manipulate the budget as things change and bills go up or down. My only concern is that I have to go back and forth between the income and expenses. I wish there was a way to see the whole picture on one screen. I also used the app on my other tablet when I was recently carrying two mortgages.. One budget showed the reality of what was and the other of what could be. Now I only have one mortgage and fewer bills.

The app is excellent. The only thing it laks (and would make me pay for it, I suposse) is the ability to have more than one account. I had to find another app that does the same that this one does just to make it posible (and its not easy. Aparently, Android users are good at finance and not a disaster like me to need an app like this)

title: Goalist: Daily Planner, To-Do, Time & Goal Tracker
description:
Dynamic Self-Adjusting To-Do List • Reminders • Scheduler • Daily Planner • Time Organizer • Time Usage Statistics • Goal Setting • Goal Monitoring • Goal Tracking • Arbitrary Data Logging • Sophisticated Alarms • Checklists • Widgets • 3 Types of Notes For Each Task • Recurrent Reminders

Have you realized that small tweaks don't work in the long run? And that you need a radical change to see a radical improvement in your life? Goalist offers you a path that's undeniably different.

It doesn't merely remind you to do stuff - that's simple and ineffective. It's too easy to just postpone a reminder. You end up with a bunch of annoying to-dos...

Goalist helps you determine what to do and why and then provides flexible tools to plan and realize the plan. It helps you transform into a highly effective Time Management Master.

Unsuccessful people use lack of time as a good excuse. Successful people have the exact same amount of time as anyone. They just manage it well. And as a goal achiever you know you cannot manage it if you don't measure it and plan in advance. Goalist allows you to create very detailed daily plans. And if anything changes Goalist adjusts the plan for you. It respects the unchangeable fact that a day has 24 hours. Unsuccessful people see taking the responsibility for each minute as too much burden. Successful people know it's the only way to get the most out of every day.

If you're diligent enough to create a complete plan every day, you'll see 24 hours is actually a lot. Based on your schedules you'll be able to generate and analyze useful stats, graphs and notifications. It will help you understand your current habits, set goals to improve them and stay motivated. You can monitor not only your time usage, but also other kinds of data that you put into a log.


Goalist is extremely flexible and has a plethora of features:
★ Personal  organizer. Helps you manage time and daily life better.
★ Time tracker. You can assign tags and create graphs to look at your time usage from various angles.
★ Routine statistics. Analyze your distribution of time, detect time leaks, increase your productivity.
★ Personal notes. Each task can have unlimited notes.
★ Routine planner. Tasks can be grouped into Task Sets for fast & easy planning.
★ Reminders. Schedule activities that don't fit in a routine: one-time activities or tasks with an arbitrary repetition cycle.
★ Checklists. Each task can have a list of things you don't want to forget about when you perform it. Eg: a list of things you always want to take to the swimming pool.
★ Free planner - most functionality is available for free.
★ Timeboxing / time blocking
★ As your routine manager
★ As your task reminder
★ As your timetable planner
★ As your habit creation tool
★ As your productivity enhancer
★ As an agenda for routine tasks
★ Most powerful & customizable planner for Android. Features grouped into Modules.
★ Absolutely unique, life-changing approach to planning
★ Lets you specify your life values and goals, and group your tasks according to them or arbitrary categories.


Sign up for a video training with deep insights about time management: https://www.goalist.club/


Unless you know a shortcut or trick - simply tune yourself week by week!

comments: Have been using goalist more than 2 years with paid subscription. Awesome App. Had high hopes. Could have been great. But looks like it has been abandoned. Forum link not working. Cannot report bugs. No updates from past 6 months. There has been no progress in development on any modules. Want to but won't renew subscription in good conscience. Looked at subscription history, have paid around 3100 bucks, no accountability from developers, they just put the development on hold without announcement

I've only been using it one day, but it's exactly the app I need to manage my time better. I suggest following their advice and tutorials for getting started: start by logging what you do throughout the day.
This app is amazing. I am a longtime paid user with ADHD and I adore all of the functionality. Thanks for everything you do, you have literally changed my life in many ways.

App have potential, but "awaiting for development" shouldn't be used as an add-up to the functionality list if they aren't being implemented yet. Paying up for functionality that isn't working is almost fraud. Sorry, but it's true. Be confident in your development an people may follow the growth of your app or simply promote it as it is and surprise with every updated functionality. Keep it up! 👍

Nice, but OVERCOMPLICATED! Not for the average user. It feels very personalised, like it is someone's life or brain that they have laid out in an app. The idea is definitely there, but it needs some simplification. I really want to use it, but trying to get my head around setting a goal, then adding a task, which category or value it goes in?? By the end of it feel more confused than hopeful I'm so sorry to say. Just some constructive feedback for the designers, and nothing personal.

title: Daily Hope - Pastor Rick Warren
description:
Download this app FREE to love, learn, and LIVE the Word every day with Pastor Rick Warren!

The Daily Hope app is an easy way to get Pastor Rick’s free Daily Hope devotional delivered to you every morning, digital versions of his most popular small group studies, and a new 25 minute Daily Hope radio broadcast every day that will connect you to the powerful hope in God’s Word.

Includes:

-A new devotional every day written by Rick Warren

-A new 25-minute Daily Hope radio broadcast every day

-The ability to increase font size for easy reading

-Digital version of Rick Warren’s most popular spiritual growth studies (with video & fill-in-the-blank workbooks)

Whether you are on the go, or leading a small group study at home (you can screen share the video studies to your Apple TV or Roku), the Daily Hope app will inspire more devotional time in God’s Word!

Download the Daily Hope App FREE!

comments: Includes Rick's daily email devotional AND his weekdays podcast. I can easily change the font size. I don't 100% agree with all of the content, but it's not just the Word of God (although it contains plenty of Scripture references). Be mindful that there are other translations & interpretations and the most literal translation is not always be chosen. Take things with a grain of salt: if you say, "I don't remember that in the Bible," please look it up in various translations or the interlinear.
This app is amazing. His insight on God is intelligent and admiring! I read his book "What on Earth Am I Here For" and ever since been a fan. Love it love it love it!

it's a wonderful way to start the day thru devotion. it's an easy read. Pastor Rick explains, guides and asks important questions. i have been using it for some time now and the app is well made. it has a user friendly interface, even both my parents find it easy to use. thank you Pastor Rick and everyone who worked and is still working to better the app and everything it contains.

Love this App!!! Just listening to Rick Warren on a daily basis is so helpful in my life. A lot of times his sermons help me with something that I am dealing with in my life at that moment. Thank you Pastor Rick. God Bless you for helping so many people.
I very much like this app. The user interface, so simple. The contents, so relevant.

title: My Daily Devotion - Bible App & Caller ID Screen
description:
** Get My Daily Devotion - The #1 Free Daily Religious Bible App for Android **

My Daily Devotion provides daily inspiration each and every day on your smartphone.  Every day you are greeted with a new prayer to take on the day in addition to a Bible verse with added commentary.  

You will also receive a Caller ID screen feature as part of this app which provides inspirational messages on the caller ID screen when you complete phone calls.  This caller  ID feature helps you identify numbers real-time while the call is happening - even the ones not in your phonebook. No more number guessing or avoiding unknown callers – The My Daily Devotion Bible App caller ID prepares you for the call. If your local pizza vendor doesn’t pick up the phone when you’re calling, My Daily Devotion Bible App caller ID will suggest alternative nearby places. You can always adjust your caller ID settings in the settings menu or deactivate it if you do not find it useful.


**NEW** We now have Bible Trivia included in the app and the addition of Prayer Points.  You earn prayer points for the way you interact with the app and can use them for additional features! 

My Daily Devotion is an app created by TheBibleAppProject.org. TheBibleAppProject.org is devoted to providing religious apps to millions of users around the world.  Our goal is to provide great content to Christians, such as daily inspiration though Bible quotes and Bible Verses.  Get the most important scripture with this app.

This is FREE to use.  Get My Daily Devotion Bible App for Android for Bible Quotes, Women Devotions, Bible Study, Scripture and Daily Prayers!

This app also offers additional content which is available for purchase and is exclusive only to TheBibleAppProject.org.  There are different prayer guides and Bible guides which will help get you through your day.  Again, these are optional for you to purchase if you wish, there is still endless Bible and religious content for you to enjoy for FREE! Use any of these for your Bible Study.

We also have a "Favorites" feature.  This allows you to save your favorite scriptures, quotes and prayers.  This will allow you to have quick and easy access to them during your next study.  Download for Free.

There are different prayer guides and Bible guides which will help get you through your day. Again, these are optional for you to purchase if you wish, there is still endless Bible and religious content for you to enjoy for FREE! Use any of these for your Bible Study.

We also have a "Favorites" feature. This allows you to save your favorite scriptures, quotes and prayers. This will allow you to have quick and easy access to them during your next study. Download for Free.

title: Daily Ab Workout - Core & Abs Fitness Exercises
description:
Daily Ab Workout FREE is a great 5 to 10 minute daily ab routine for men and women that steps you through some of the best ab-sculpting exercises you can do in the comfort of your own home. These proven workouts, demonstrated by a certified personal trainer, target all major abdominal muscles. Spending just minutes a day can strengthen your core and tone your abs. The routine's simple interface, complete with video and timer, allows you to easily follow along and understand each exercise.

FEATURES: 
• Two different 5 to 10 minute ab-sculpting workouts
• Great for both men and women
• Video showing how to do each exercise 
• Developed by a certified personal trainer
• On-screen instructions and timer
• No internet required to do the workouts

If you like Daily Ab Workout FREE, check out the full version which features:
  • More workouts

OR

Had the paid version on my old phone now it wants me to pay £15 for the ad free version of all the apps and this version now has adds and only 2 work out programmes. Will not be paying £15 when I already paid for this app individually.

title: Daily Audio Bible Mobile App
description:
Welcome to the official Daily Audio Bible mobile app!

The Daily Audio Bible takes you through the whole Bible in a year one day at a time but it's a lot more than that. This isn't just your basic listen along. The Daily Audio Bible is read fresh every day and you will discover a vibrant and global community of friends following the same quest. You have to experience it to believe it.

The DAB App consolidates all the different facets of the community experience. Welcome to the adventure.

For more information about Daily Audio Bible, please visit www.dailyaudiobible.com.

comments: Inspirational & encouraging. Nice layout with the option to read along and journal. Also has a place to check if you've already listened. My only question is why is there 2 android versions for same app? The layout on this is more organized. I paid a small fee for other version and this one didn't charge. Maybe that's because I am paid and this is established when I signed in? One difference is u can download to listen offline on other app but layout is better on this one.

Update 1/2/20: I contacted tech at DAB & they worked with me to fix the issues. Thank you! The app works well and the upgrades are great!!!! The upgrade is HORRIBLE! It constantly crashes on my Android and doesn't recognize my password or email that works perfectly on my desktop. It skips and fades out during playback and doesn't remember my place after crashing so I always have to restart. I hope you can correct these bugs because I like the new features and LOVE DAB

This is the greatest ever.( 2020 My second year) To sit and daily follow along, the word being read to you. No need to try to pronounce the many biblical words and names, Brian does it for you. No need to get different versions of the bible, it's all right there. Click listen, click read and each day fill you heart and mind with the word of God from the bible. Even a brief review and commentary and prayer each day. I LOVE IT AND THANK GOD IT.

I love the app when it works. I have a lot of trouble keeping it connected and it does not sync with my progress on the web page. I really want it to work because it is the best way to access the devotion each day.
This is what I have needed for so long. A consistent daily feeding of God's word has never been easier. And it's fresh every day with prayer and encouragement afterwards.

title: Zen Stories Daily
description:
Zen is a form of Buddhism that places emphasis on attaining awakening or the “path of enlightenment.” It’s used as a method of trying to discover the true meaning of life. Zen teaches its followers to strip away their “layers” – their expectations, opinions and even beliefs – so that they can see the truth of who they really are and what they really want in their lives. Zen encourages its practitioners to meditate to find their “Buddha-nature.” It teaches that Buddha-nature is a natural state of wisdom and virtue that everyone has inside of them. Zen stories, or "koans", are told with the express purpose of trying to get the listener to open their mind to the possibilities that life offers  exploring possibilities that they themselves have never considered. 

Download Zen Daily now & enjoy some amazing features:
- Share daily quote on social network & using other messaging tools
- Listen to background music, to create a serene environment
- Set an alarm to receive daily quote notification
- Add Quotes to your favorites
- Copy the quote to Clipboard
- In app purchase (to make the application Ad free)
- Look at other Dailypedia Apps

Download now & enjoy daily bliss!

title: GRE Daily Vocabulary
description:
Having strong vocabulary skills is a crucial element of success on the GRE test!
 
Every day, we will provide you with an Economist passage that features a common GRE vocabulary word, plus its synonyms and definition.

Experts recommend reading vocabulary in context rather than cramming definitions, and The Economist is one of the publications most frequently cited for doing so.
 
You can save words to review later and flip through our archive to see words from past days.
 
This app is best used in combination with the full Economist GRE Tutor program, which utilizes adaptive learning technology to provide top tier practice for every topic on the GRE. 

Our goal is to help you achieve your target score on the GRE exam, and help you gain admission into the grad school of your choice!

comments: Love it though, great vocab range and examples. However, it would be perfect to have like a bookmark function so you can get back to where you left off, otherwise it will just be a lot of taxing swiping through words you have already learnt. Everything else is excellent, hope you could improve it for the better. ❤️❤️

Very good app. Meaning of the word and its related reference from the actual article helps a lot to understand the word better. However, you won't get a new word daily. Overall its a useful companion!

Just amazing. It’s a huge platform of learning some 'heavyweight' words through the prominent news paper The Economist. I think they are doing it as the part of Social commitment and responsibility. Hats off to the team Economist.
Pronunciation scheme as well as audio pronunciation is must for learning. Please update and incorporate the same in future updates.
The app is stupendous, a great platform for an inchoate learner. The only problem is that the premium version is highly priced and therefore not easily affordable by students.

title: Swiggy Daily
description:
Swiggy Daily
Eating right every day isn’t easy. We get it. The cook’s times don’t match your erratic schedule, the office canteen’s food gets monotonous and you don’t always have the time to cook. 
 
This is where Swiggy Daily comes in. Swiggy Daily brings you a wide range of meals and meal plans from hand-picked kitchens around you, with flexible subscription plans and single meal options. 
 
Tell us when and where you want the meals delivered, and they'll reach you on time, every time. And at prices that won’t pinch your pockets; all our meals are free of delivery costs
 
We’re committed to clean, simple cooking to serve food that you can rely on every day. All our kitchens are certified for hygiene and quality by the FSSAI
 
And because we know that one size doesn’t fit all, we have a large variety of plans to choose from – North Indian, South Indian, Bengali, Rajasthani, continental, healthy and much more. We’re still adding to this list and hope you find exactly what you’re looking for 
 
Flexibility at your fingertips: 
 
Subscribe for as long as you want
3 day, 7 day or even month long plans. Choose what works for you
 
Going on vacation?
Pause your plan for those days and resume when you’re back
 
Don’t like the meal coming today?
Swap the upcoming meal with any other meal from the menu
 
Sudden plans to go out? 
Skip the upcoming meal and your plan will move ahead by a day
 
Never feel bound
Cancel your plan anytime
 
Don’t want to commit just yet? 
You can always schedule single meals, an hour in advance
 
Currently serving in Gurgaon. Install the app now and sort your everyday food in a jiffy.

The help and support is not available. It always start downloading and fails. This thing I have reported 2 months ago but it haven't resolved. I think its good time to say you guys bye bye

title: Daily Photo - personal diary
description:
Daily Photo allows you to create a diary of your life by creating a journal of your daily events. You can keep track of your feelings, ideas, document your last holiday or how you, your kids or even your pets change over time. Or you can do everything at once.

Take as many photos as you want, write down your thoughts and feelings and keep them all in one easy accessible place.
The taken pictures are stored in full quality on your phone. The App provides a simple to use timeline, a monthly calendar and a gallery to view your diary entries.
Statistics show you, how long you are using this app and how many entries you already have added.

Additional Features:
- Simple to use
- Import existing or take new photos through your camera
- Share photos with "Facebook" or other social networks or even send them to other Apps like "Whats App".
- Schedule a daily reminder.
- Backup/Restore your progress through the integrated backup/restore functionality.

Planed for future releases:
- Support for multiple albums
- Backup to Google Drive
- Data export (i.e. for printing)
- Themes
- Password protected albums

This app uses ads for monetisation as i spent a lot of time developing, you can purchase the pro version for an ad free experience.
If you have any feature suggestions or bug reports please do not hesitate to contact me, i will try to fix them as soon as possible.

comments: Great app! I've been using it to track my daily drawings instead of photos, and it works just as well for that purpose. I wish it supported more file types (e.g. png) but I don't mind, still does exactly what I wanted! Thank you!!

It does something I really need, so thank you. Please expand my ability to add a photo from the past to a date in the past. This could be by enabling me to share from inside Google Photos, then select a date. Or, it'd work if I could select an album from which to upload a photo inside Daily Photos; I'd just put the pictures I need to add there, first. Thank you!

GIVES YOU VISION! I use this app everyday now to take 2 photos of each side of my face and track the progress of my acne healing. I was inspired and hoped to find an app to make a timelapse video, but I came across something better- this app. You can store multiple photos on one square of the calendar. I can really see a daily difference, now I'll never have to wonder if what I'm doing is working again.

I love this app! I'm able to see my photos in a daily calendar which is exactly what I wanted. The only thing that I can see improving this for me is being able to take up the entire day on the calendar with my photo so there is no white space, but honestly I think it's fabulous as is :)
Great app would love the chance to create a printed story book at the end of the year

title: Sketch a Day: Daily challenges & tutorials
description:
Get daily inspiration and get your creativity flowing with Sketch a Day! Join 50,000 artists in the best sketching community around!

The idea is simple: every day, we set a new subject for everyone to draw. You do your sketch or drawing, take a photo, and upload it for that day for everyone to see.

You can sketch, draw, paint, use digital art apps. Whatever you like that gets you into the habit of drawing every day.

Submit as many as you like, and see your progress over time.

And with the all-new Learn section, you will find great tutorials from our wonderful community of talented artists. Want to learn watercolours? Craving crafty ideas? Need to practise drawing people? Then the Learn section is perfect for you.

Lots of people are using Sketch a Day as a great way to start a positive habit. I have had many messages of support about the effect it has had on people's mental health, wellness and mindfulness. Sketching is a great habit to get into, even if like so many people, you think you "can't draw". It's a very peaceful, quiet and creative pastime, and receiving the help and support of others is a great way to feel good about yourself.

Sketch a Day is a wonderful, positive community with people from all over the world coming together to draw a common theme. If you need ideas for drawing, inspiration, encouragement or just want to look at amazing art, Sketch a Day is the right app for you.

If you've ever participated in Inktober, this app is like that - but forever - and you have a place to share your work and enjoy others.

** Sketch a Day is growing fast **

There are over 50,000 artists in the community now. It's just growing faster and faster all the time!


If you want to learn, want to get back into drawing, or just want a quick practice or warm-up, then Sketch a Day could be perfect for you. For beginners, we have tips and tutorials each day. For the experts, you can post your images and show your skills to the world.


So...go sharpen your pencils!

---

Did you know?

• By drawing each day and getting likes, you can build your own private gallery of famous masterpieces.
• Parental controls make Sketch a Day a safer place. You can prevent 'adult material' from being seen by your children by setting a PIN on the parental controls.
• You can comment on people's sketches so you can ask how they did it, ask for tips, give them some kudos or just be silly!
• You can also add your Instagram account name so people can follow you on Instagram quickly and easily.
• When you've done a drawing, you can share it on Facebook straight from the app.

We have had some really creative drawings in our first few months. We've had pencils, watercolours, digital drawing, pen and ink, acrylics. We've had kids, adults, beginners, improvers and experts!

---

I would like to use this space to say thank you to all the people who have messaged me to tell me how Sketch a Day has made their lives better. Drawing every day really seems to have a huge positive effect on people's lives.

comments: This is one of those apps that make you thankful we have the technology that we (humans) do; and the interface is good, easy, app has been stable. I paid for gold - if this is in your interest, I highly suggest trying it out at least! There's free version and one below gold as well, so no reason you can't try it out if you like art!

I usually never rate with 5 stars, but the rating needs to get at least at 4.5. It's a great app to improve your skills and take some wonderful ideas. I find the community great, the developers better and the challenges nearly perfect. It works just fine on my phone and the fact that it does not contain a subscription, but rather a one-time small payment (optional of course) seems really kind of the developers and moving to me. An app purely based on the community, and I love it ♡.

Really kind and supportive community! Even if you're just beginning and making heaps of mistakes, we've all been there, and I've never seen any rude behaviour in the app. Prompts are interesting and varied, and you can see all different kinds of art people have uploaded, from detailed oil paintings to simple abstract sketches to colourful digital pieces. I am not a paying member and there are no annoying ads, but if you upgrade you have the option to direct message other creators and more.

I'm loving this app so far, it's great daily practise + inspiration for when you don't know what to draw. I like that there are tutorials for different mediums and skill levels. I think it would be really cool if there was a way to tag your art besides the medium used so you can look at specific things. Alongside a tagging system, blacklisting would also be nice. Then people could have more freedom with what they draw while others can blacklist their triggers.

Great way to do some art everyday. So much more motivating than just setting the goal to draw daily because there are real artists putting up talented stuff. Makes you want to get back into doing your best and becoming better, even if you're just using the app in a light-hearted way. Love the daily prompts and that you can look ahead and prepare. I'm not an arty person but there's no ads so it's cool there are ways to support the devs by purchasing art supplies or paying for features.

title: New York Daily News epaper
description:
New York's #1 newspaper delivered in amazing digital quality.

Read the full newspaper even when you're offline.
Swipe quickly and easily between newspaper pages. 
Tap or zoom pages for large display or long-hold on any article to access the text version.

Receive 1 month free with your 6-month subscription, available for $13.99. 
Receive 1 week free with your 1-month subscription, available for $2.99.

title: DailyArt - Your Daily Dose of Art History Stories
description:
Every day get inspired by classic, modern and contemporary art masterpieces and read short stories about them. Join the community of over 700.000 art lovers, for whom DailyArt is something that enlightens their day, every day. For free!

Furthermore:
- Explore and search the collection of more than 2000 masterpieces,
- Read 700 artist biographies and information about 500 museum collections,
- Add masterpieces to your favorites,
- Easily find DailyArts which you haven't seen yet,
- Share everything among your family and friends,
- Set up your account and use DailyArt on multiple devices including tablets and smartwatches
- Copy the text of the description
- Use a widget!
- Set up a morning or an evening time for your push notification
- And what's the most important - enjoy art <3

Do you want to know why van Gogh cut off his ear? Or who is the lady on Picasso's portrait? How Jackson Pollock created his paintings? Open DailyArt and find out. According to media and our users, DailyArt is a must-have app for all art lovers, as some journalists wrote about us:

- "Even if you already know the work, you may not know all the fascinating details the app serves up on the backstory of the art."  - Victor Luckerson, Time Magazine

- “DailyArt is your daily dose of classic paintings, serving up a proverbial shot of espresso to awaken the inner culture vulture in you (...) One of the best 12 educational apps of 2012" - Paul Sawers, The Next Web

- "With its superb images and informative biographical blurbs, DailyArt is perfect for those looking to add some culture to their day." - Kelly Hodgkins, TUAW

Learn something new about art every day - you just need two minutes. Download your espresso shot of art, for free.

comments: Have been using this every day for the last month, to provide me with inspiration for a daily drawing practice. I tried a couple of other apps before this, but this one best suited my purpose. I really like it - the choice of paintings is broad (in time period, subject matter, medium, and tradition), and getting broader. So far, then, I have no complaints. And I'm probably going to upgrade to the paid version soon. 15/03/20 I have indeed upgraded to the paid version, and it's worth every penny.

Use most days. And look at every day's offering. Seems to me to be a good way to get a feeling and understanding of art. A good mix of well known art / artists and the less famous (at least to me as a novice). I intend to continue using as I feel the app content providers are doing a very good job.

Good, but there are a lot of paintings/ photos that are duplicates (some of these versions are even filtered). Also there aren't a lot of women artists as well as international artists from other countries like South East Asia or Africa, etc. Edit: I see that there are now more women artists being featured. Thank you, Daily Art!

Beautiful Art (Mostly), awesome app. Thank you so much to the people who run this app who have been teaching me about art. I have always liked art and learning about the pieces I really like. This app has introduced me to so much of the art world I might ordinarily pass by. I love getting my daily dose, most days I enjoy the piece, some days I detest what I am being shown, however, those days I make sure I read about the piece and more often than not, I gain a new perspective of the piece.

Look forward to new art experiences. I often Google the gallery/museums and the artist after to learn more. At 70 I can't afford to drive and park and admission to shows in Toronto. But when I was working, they were always priorities when I travelled. Chicago, Boston, Detroit, San Francisco, Los Angeles, new York, London, India, Peru, Thailand etc. Art enriches. Thank you.
